name: Sliding Square
description:
Create your own road to dodge the obstacles that will stand in front of you!
A simple slip of the finger allows to create a support to your character to bring it to victory.

But beware! You must push your responsiveness and your anticipation to the extreme to pass all levels.

Play, right now, to this game close to impossible.

Many levels and characters are available.
A training mode is available to you to be ready to face the difficulty level.

You can follow us on Facebook and Twitter:
- https://www.facebook.com/DorgameOfficial
- https://twitter.com/Dorgame
